body_html:
@petewarden Ok, thanks.

One side note: When I run tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen_file_lists.sh, I have four files modified, and pretty unrelated to the change in this PR.

modified:   tensorflow/contrib/makefile/proto_text_cc_files.txt
modified:   tensorflow/contrib/makefile/proto_text_pb_cc_files.txt
modified:   tensorflow/contrib/makefile/proto_text_pb_h_files.txt
modified:   tensorflow/contrib/makefile/tf_proto_files.txt

The contents remove and add .cc files and .proto.

I think this is unrelated, but perhaps an important cleaning stage. Another similar issue has just popped up with the dynamic RNN API, and I wonder if the gen_file_lists script could not help keeping in sync with Bazel more easily. Working on this, so more issues to come~

body:
@petewarden Ok, thanks.

One side note: When I run `tensorflow/contrib/makefile/gen_file_lists.sh`, I have four files modified, and pretty unrelated to the change in this PR.

```
modified:   tensorflow/contrib/makefile/proto_text_cc_files.txt
modified:   tensorflow/contrib/makefile/proto_text_pb_cc_files.txt
modified:   tensorflow/contrib/makefile/proto_text_pb_h_files.txt
modified:   tensorflow/contrib/makefile/tf_proto_files.txt
```

The contents remove and add `.cc` files and `.proto`.

I think this is unrelated, but perhaps an important cleaning stage. Another similar issue has just popped up with the dynamic RNN API, and I wonder if the `gen_file_lists` script could not help keeping in sync with Bazel more easily. Working on this, so more issues to come~
